text: Benče () is a small village located in the region of Porece in the municipality of Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia. It used to be part of the former municpality of Samokov. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 43 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 168. *Macedonians 43 ==References== Category:Villages in Makedonski Brod Municipality
title: Benče
